Summary Note:
The Relationship Manager (RM) first met Moens Vandenberghe Hermans at a charity gala in Brussels. They had a long conversation about their mutual interest in philanthropy and decided to stay in touch.
Moens Vandenberghe Hermans is a seasoned professional with over 12 years of experience.
He was drawn to Julius Baer's holistic financial planning and investment strategies, prompting the decision to join.
Family Background: Moens Vandenberghe Hermans is married to Justine. Moens and Justine have 2 children, named Anaïs and Smets.
Education Background:
Moens obtained his secondary school diploma from Ecole Secondaire Libre du Sacré-Cœur in 2006.
Moens graduated from Vesalius College in 2013, completing his higher education.
Occupation History:
Moens Vandenberghe Hermans is a 36 year old and comes from Belgium.
Moens Vandenberghe Hermans began his professional journey as a Assistant Designer at Dries Van Noten NV in 2013, laying the foundation for future success.
He then transitioned to Walter Van Beirendonck BVBA as a Senior Designer, leveraging his expertise to drive results from 2020 to 2025.
Wealth Summary:
During his work, he focused on financial growth, making diverse investments and ultimately saving 90000 EUR.
He owns house in Geel, where he resides. It is worth 1280000 EUR.

In addition to his primary residence, he owns house in Binche worth 1500000 EUR.

In 2016, he received an inheritance of 140000 EUR from his late grandfather, who was a prominent Tech Entrepreneur, and has since invested it in various assets.
Client Summary: In light of the above, we are optimistic about the client's financial future and career progression and are eager to welcome him as a new client.
